price: 23. Bango balobi: O Nkolo wa biso! Tobubi milimo mia biso, mpe soki olimbisi biso te mpe oyokeli biso mawa te, ya sólo, tokozuama o kati ya bazangi.
arabic: قَالَا رَبَّنَا ظَلَمۡنَآ أَنفُسَنَا وَإِن لَّمۡ تَغۡفِرۡ لَنَا وَتَرۡحَمۡنَا لَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qālā rabbanā ẓalamnā anfusanā wa-in lam taghfir lanā watarḥamnā lanakūnanna mina al-khāsirīna
